content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Water extraction system at position(x=-16.5, y=26.5)
Consists of offshore pump at position(x=-16.5, y=26.5) and pipe at position(x=-16.5, y=25.5)

### Boiler system at position(x=1.5, y=1.0)
Consists of boiler at position(x=1.5, y=1.0), boiler at position(x=1.5, y=3.0), and multiple pipes connected to the boilers

### Electricity distribution system
Consists of multiple small-electric-poles at positions(x=3.5, y=2.5), (x=7.5, y=-0.5), (x=7.5, y=0.5), (x=7.5, y=2.5), (x=3.5, y=0.5)

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when placing entities
- Ensure the target tile is empty before attempting to place an entity
### Errors when connecting entities
- Make sure the entities are compatible and can be connected before attempting to connect them
### Errors when using offshore pumps
- Ensure the offshore pump is placed near a water source and has a pipe connected to it to transport the extracted fluid
### Errors when using boilers
- Ensure the boiler has a fuel source and is connected to a pipe to transport the produced steam
### Errors when using pipes
- Ensure the pipes are connected to entities that can produce or consume fluids, and that the fluid systems are properly configured
